definitions.definition: (social) To do with structure or procedure.
A blank document or template to be filled in by the user.
definitions.example: To apply for the position, complete the application form.

definitions.definition: A specimen document to be copied or imitated.

definitions.example: The orchestra was on top form this evening.

definitions.definition: (grammar) A grouping of words which maintain grammatical context in different usages; the particular shape or structure of a word or part of speech.
The den or home of a hare.
The type or other matter from which an impression is to be taken, arranged and secured in a chase.
(fitness) A specific way of performing a movement.
